__e: - Did you go to the police about it?
Ma died in Paso a couple of months ago and she come up north hunting her pa.
Why didn't you go to the police?
My parents wouldn't give him cash to take the train, so he took off on foot.
Then he went to see his wife - she was awake by then - who told him they had a son.
My father told me the first time he went to my mother's house she stood in the doorway.
After work he went to get the girls, but they'd already left.
He went to America to find a place for them, and she was killed a week later.
It was like my world blew to pieces and all I wanted to do was find out why.
He went alone, you see. I would've gone, but I didn't know.
But then I married and went somewhere and she married and went somewhere.
She went to her father, he told her... To keep it quiet.
Seven years ago, the master left the house with all the family's money.
Then he backed off and... He left, and I don't think he ever came back home again.
Because when he was 17 years old and he left home... because all he had...was nothing.
Right after his great success, when nobody wanted him.
My wedding-- at least my first wedding-- Didn't go so well.
